text: Gei mee ga helekai anga, “Goodou e hagamaanadu bolo ma go goodou mo di king la hua ne hagau mai iei au go di king aamua belee helekai i nia mee aanei? Deeai! Au e helekai labelaa gi nia daangada ala e noho i hongo di abaaba, go digau ala gaa gai nadau duudae gei ga inu nadau mimi, gadoo be di godou hai dela gaa hai!”
